text: During a chat with E! News about his band's upcoming album, their first in four years, Leto gushed about working with West all those years ago. "It was incredible," the 45-year-old said, recalling an impromptu live performance together. "We had a show in Spain, and I remember I called him up, and said, 'Hey, man. Do you want to come and play this show with us in Madrid?... It was the night before, and he was like, 'Yeah, why not?!' So he flew over, and he showed up. I couldn't even believe that it all happened."
